fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Make a LGBTQ+ interview at someone's house at night, each night. You will learn all visitors' pronouns, but not who visited.
-Guess a role. If its in the game, you will learn the pronouns of the player who has it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -This role has the same abbreviation as Neutral (Benign)
